column4: hi guys I am having problems in my terminal on a Ubuntu VM i downloaded... there are some keys like the single qoutes etc that I am unable to get
and also I am unable to write the ~ sign for example
its annoying
can somebody help me look at the keyboard mapping etc?
: are you using the right keyboard layout settings?
not sure
thats what I wanted to check and see whats going on
: check the keyboard icon in your tray
I don't see one in the tray
what do I check for next?
From applications?
: is it the right layout?
I cannot find the KEYBOARD in the tray like you said!
: Check System > Pref/Admin (sorry I forget, I'm not on ubuntu) > Keyboard
no worries, its got "Generic 105 key (Intl) PC" selceted
sorry that is the keyboard model
: it's on your VM right? (your Ubuntu running in VM) ?
layout = USA Alternative International (former us_intl)
did you get all that? :)
should I choose something else?
: maybe?
: sorry I'm not on Ubuntu right now :(
maybe? why is that?
